about_the_game:
What? Just opened the game and got shot? Begin the training of calculation, beat your opponents, then you will face...

Main Content

  • LOGO page with extremely high mortality rates

  • Use Training Mode to enhance computing skills

  • In Challenge Mode, play against Unemployed middle-aged, a math teacher H, and the game producer who has been training hard with this game for a week

Feedback

  • Game Producer: I played dozens of hours of Training Mode to make it hard for you to finish the challenge!

  • Joshua: The game producer in Challenge Mode is too weak

  • Friend Yuan: Huh? Why did I get shot in the LOGO page?

  • Venture partner who used to be a math teacher: (Silently shuts down the game)

Producer's words

Hello everyone, this is my third game which focuses on simple mind exercises. A long time ago, I thought that being good numerate only kept me from getting ripped off when shopping for groceries. But with daily planning, accounting reports, I found that! Excellent computing ability....... is not as easy to use as a calculator or excel. However, with the practice of calculation, my brain feels less lazy and my memory has improved! However, with the practice of calculation, my brain feels less lazy and my memory has improved! That sentence sounds...... familiar...... Anyway, I wish you all a good time playing~

About Me

Hello everyone, I'm Hao, an educator, lifelong learner and a game producer.

I'm working hard to make some serious game, and some educational games which could influence our life in the real world.

Well, I wish you all a happy study time ~

Oh, I mean, I wish you all a happy gaming time~

name: Brain Overload: Calculate

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 /11
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core 2.0 (or higher)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 and higher
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: A computing training game where you get shot when you open the game. Train yourself, challenge the game producer, and exercise your brain!
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
